T02D1929:39b-1: krishna ya m'a ri n'a ma s'a dha nam /
T02D1929:39b-3: gshin rje gshed nag po zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs /
T02D1929:39b-4: dpal khro bo 'jigs pa can la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1929:39b-5: dpal ldan 'jam pa'i rdo rje mchog / drag shul che zhing 'jigs par byed //
T02D1929:39b-6: khro chen de la phyag 'tshal te //
T02D1929:39b-7: de yi sgrub pa'i thabs bshad bya //
T02D1929:39b-8: de la sngags pa dbang dang dam tshig dang ldan pa /
T02D1929:39b-11: shes rab dang ldan pa des /
T02D1929:39b-12: gnas dur khrod la sogs pa yid dga' ba'i gnas su gnas te /
T02D1929:39b-13: brtul zhugs mchog spyad par bya'o //
T02D1929:39b-14: bdag nyid rdzogs pa'i tshul gyis lhar bskyed de //
T02D1929:39b-15: snying gar nyi ma'i steng du h'um bsam pa //
T02D1929:39b-16: de la 'od zer gyis bskul nas spyan drangs te /
T02D1929:39b-18: phyi nang gi mchod pa'i bye brag dbul /
T02D1929:39b-19: de nas sdig pa bshags pa dang //
T02D1929:39b-20: rjes su yi rang bya ba dang //
T02D1929:39b-21: gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang //
T02D1929:39b-22: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /
T02D1929:39b-23: tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgoms nas /
T02D1929:39b-24: de nas stong pa nyid du bsgom par bya ste /
T02D1929:39b-25: gang gi rnam par yang mi bsgom mo //
T02D1929:39b-26: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sv'a bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1929:39b-28: sdang ba thams cad bsreg par bya //
T02D1929:39b-29: bsdus pas rdo rje gur du gyur //
T02D1929:39b-30: ra ba dra ba bsam par bya //
T02D1929:39b-31: de nas nam mkha'i dbyings bsam bya //
T02D1929:39b-32: de yis nang du gzhal yas khang //
T02D1929:39b-33: rdo rje rgya gram yang dag ldan //
T02D1929:39b-34: rta babs bzhi dang ldan par bsgom //
T02D1929:39b-35: nyi gdan ma he yi dags te //
T02D1929:39b-36: rnam pa lnga po bsgom pa ni //
T02D1929:39b-37: a'a li bsgoms pas zla ba ste //
T02D1929:39b-38: k'a li bsgoms pas rta bdun nyid //
T02D1929:39b-39: gnyis kyi bar du h'um bsams te //
T02D1929:39b-40: de nas rdo rje rtse lnga pa //
T02D1929:40a-2: de las 'od byung don byas nas //
T02D1929:40a-4: de las rdo rje sems dpa' ni //
T02D1929:40a-5: zhal gsum phyag ni drug pa la //
T02D1929:40a-6: g-yas dkar g-yon pa dmar ba ste //
T02D1929:40a-7: rtsa ba'i lus mdog nag po'o //
T02D1929:40a-8: rdo rje ral gri gri gug g-yas //
T02D1929:40a-10: rdo rje rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan //
T02D1929:40a-11: g-yon pa brkyang ba'i zhabs kyis gnas //
T02D1929:40a-12: rang rig ldan pa rab tu bsgom //
T02D1929:40a-13: rdo rje padma dag bya ste //
T02D1929:40a-14: bde gshegs thig le zla bar gyur //
T02D1929:40a-15: de las yakshe ma me da //
T02D1929:40a-16: ya tsa ni r'a dz'a sa do //
T02D1929:40a-17: ru na yo ni ra dag ste //
T02D1929:40a-18: so so'i sa bon dag tu gyur ;
T02D1929:40a-19: / de las so so'i sku bskyed de //
T02D1929:40a-20: sngags chen gyis ni dbyung bar bya //
T02D1929:40a-21: aom hr'i: shtri: wi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1929:40a-22: 'khrugs pa zhal gsum phyag drug ste //
T02D1929:40a-24: lag na rdo rje chen po ste //
T02D1929:40a-25: zhe sdang chen po'i don mdzad nas //
T02D1929:40a-26: slar 'dus bdag nyid la thim bya ;
T02D1929:40a-27: / dzin dzik gis gti mug gtso //
T02D1929:40a-28: zhal gsum phyag drug pa la zhi //
T02D1929:40a-29: dangs pa'i chu zla dang mtshungs pa'o //
T02D1929:40a-30: lag tu 'khor lo thogs pa dbyung //
T02D1929:40a-31: gti mug chen po'i don byas nas //
T02D1929:40a-32: mdun gyi zla dkyil dag la dgod //
T02D1929:40a-33: ratna dhrik gis ser sna'i bdag / btso ma gser mtshungs phyag drug ste //
T02D1929:40a-34: rin chen thogs pa dbyung bar bya //
T02D1929:40a-35: ser sna dag byas don chen byas //
T02D1929:40a-36: g-yas kyi nyi dkyil dag la bsam //
T02D1929:40a-37: a'a ro li ka gis 'dod chags gtso //
T02D1929:40a-39: lag na padma thogs pa dbyung //
T02D1929:40a-40: 'dod chags chen po'i don byas te //
T02D1929:40a-41: gtso bo'i rgyab tu bsam par bya //
T02D1929:40a-42: pra dzny'a dhrik gis phrag dog bdag / zhal gsum phyag drug margad mtshungs //
T02D1929:40a-43: phyag na ral gri thogs pa dbyung //
T02D1929:40a-44: phrag dog don byas rdo rjer gyur //
T02D1929:40a-45: g-yon gyi nyi dkyil dag la bsam //
T02D1929:40a-46: mud gar dhrik gis tho ba drag / mdog gnag phyag drug tho ba bsnams //
T02D1929:40a-47: drag po chen po'i don byas nas //
T02D1929:40a-48: shar gyi sgo la bsam par bya //
T02D1929:40a-49: danda dhrik gis be con can //
T02D1929:40a-50: gser mdog lag na be con thogs //
T02D1929:40a-51: khro ba chen pos don byas nas //
T02D1929:40a-52: lho yi nyi dkyil dag la bzhugs //
T02D1929:40a-54: mdog dmar zhal gsum phyag drug pa //
T02D1929:40b-0: padma thogs pas don @40b byas te ;
T02D1929:40b-1: / nub kyi sgor ni bsam par bya //
T02D1929:40b-2: khadga dhrik gis ral gri dbyung //
T02D1929:40b-3: zhal gsum phyag drug ljang gu'o //
T02D1929:40b-4: phyag na ral gri thogs pa ste //
T02D1929:40b-5: byang gi sgor ni bsam par bya //
T02D1929:40b-6: dve sha ra ti sa tsartsi dbyung //
T02D1929:40b-8: byams pa chen pos don byas te //
T02D1929:40b-9: me yi zla dkyil bsam par bya //
T02D1929:40b-10: badzra ha ra tis phag mo dbyung //
T02D1929:40b-11: rdo rje lag 'dzin nag mo ste //
T02D1929:40b-12: snying rjes don byas slar bsdus la //
T02D1929:40b-13: lho nub zla dkyil bsam par bya //
T02D1929:40b-14: r'a ga ra tis dbyangs can dbyung //
T02D1929:40b-15: dmar mo lag na padma bsnams //
T02D1929:40b-16: dga' ba chen pos don byas nas //
T02D1929:40b-17: nub byang zla dkyil bsam par bya //
T02D1929:40b-19: ljang gu lag na ral gri 'dzin //
T02D1929:40b-20: btang snyoms chen po'i don byas nas //
T02D1929:40b-21: byang shar zla dkyil bsam par bya //
T02D1929:40b-22: bdag po'i phyag mtshan 'dra ba la //
T02D1929:40b-23: rang rtags gang yin dang por sbyin //
T02D1929:40b-24: zhal mdog rigs kyis shes par bya //
T02D1929:40b-25: yang dag don gyi 'od du zhu //
T02D1929:40b-26: 'od kyi gong bur de nyid gyur //
T02D1929:40b-27: tsartsi k'a sogs legs pa'i glus //
T02D1929:40b-28: 'od kyi gong bu sad par byed //
T02D1929:40b-30: rje btsun snying rjes khro bzhengs la //
T02D1929:40b-31: gnas gsum kun gyi gti mug sbyongs //
T02D1929:40b-32: bdud bzhi rnams las gtso bo rgyal //
T02D1929:40b-34: 'khrugs pa'i sems kyis gtso bo bzhengs //
T02D1929:40b-35: stod gnas 'jig rten mgron gnyer ci //
T02D1929:40b-36: 'jig rten sku mchog rje btsun bzhengs //
T02D1929:40b-38: stong par bsams nas ci ste bzhugs //
T02D1929:40b-39: byang chub rang bzhin 'jig rten bzhengs //
T02D1929:40b-40: dngos rnams sgyu mar bsams nas ni //
T02D1929:40b-41: 'od las yi ge h'um du bzhengs //
T02D1929:40b-42: de las gtum po khro bo'i gzugs //
T02D1929:40b-43: 'jigs byed gsus pa che ba yi //
T02D1929:40b-44: gshin rje nag po'i gzugs su gyur //
T02D1929:40b-45: zhal gsum phyag drug gong dang mthun //
T02D1929:40b-47: dum dang dum bur rnam par brgyan //
T02D1929:40b-48: shin tu khros pa'i skur bsams te //
T02D1929:40b-49: ba spu'i bu ga rnams las ni //
T02D1929:40b-50: rang gi khro bo 'phro bar bsam //
T02D1929:40b-51: 'jigs pa'i mche ba gtsigs pa'i zhal //
T02D1929:40b-52: ha ha 'byin pas za bar byed //
T02D1929:40b-53: bskal pa'i me 'bar lta bu ste //
T02D1929:40b-54: bdag nyid de lta bsam par bya //
T02D1929:40b-55: dkyil 'khor gsal bar bsams nas ni //
T02D1929:41a-1: la sogs pa byin gyis brlab //
T02D1929:41a-2: rdo rje gsum ni gnas gsum bsgom //
T02D1929:41a-3: so so'i thugs las 'od byung ste //
T02D1929:41a-4: spyan drangs mchod pa yang dag spro //
T02D1929:41a-5: so so'i rig pa'i rim pa dang //
T02D1929:41a-6: sku gsung thugs kyi sngags brjod bya //
T02D1929:41a-7: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta k'a ya badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1929:41a-8: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta b'a ga badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1929:41a-9: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta tsitta badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1929:41a-10: ye shes sems dpa' snying bsams te //
T02D1929:41a-11: de yi snying gar nyi ma bsams //
T02D1929:41a-12: de las ngas rgyal he ru ka //
T02D1929:41a-13: dbang bskur gshin gshed dbu la bsam //
T02D1929:41a-14: yang de las 'od zer 'phros pas bskul //
T02D1929:41a-15: tho ba la sogs bzhi po yis //
T02D1929:41a-16: dgug dang gzhug dang bcing ba dang //
T02D1929:41a-17: dbang du byas te mgu bar bya'o //
T02D1929:41a-18: zla ba nyi ma chu dang sman //
T02D1929:41a-19: dri ni rlung me'i 'khor lor gnas //
T02D1929:41a-20: de la dpa' bo 'bru lngar bsam //
T02D1929:41a-21: de steng du h'um las rdo rje bsam //
T02D1929:41a-22: aom gyis byin brlabs bdud rtsir bsgom //
T02D1929:41a-23: de nyid gsum ni mngon par bzlas //
T02D1929:41a-24: lce dag pas ni btung bar bya //
T02D1929:41a-25: de nas 'dod pa'i lha mo bsdu //
T02D1929:41a-26: bdag gi ba spu'i bu ga las //
T02D1929:41a-27: mchod pa spros te bdag nyid mchod //
T02D1929:41a-28: de nas 'khor rnams mchod par bya'o //
T02D1929:41a-29: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1929:41a-30: chos rnams kun gyis de la bstod //
T02D1929:41a-31: gti mug rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod //
T02D1929:41a-32: gshin rje gshed de 'jigs pa po //
T02D1929:41a-33: ston pa sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag / mgon po 'jigs byed phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D1929:41a-34: ser sna rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod //
T02D1929:41a-35: gshin rje'i dgrar grags 'jigs pa po //
T02D1929:41a-36: thugs kyi rdo rjer rab snang ba //
T02D1929:41a-37: rin chen rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D1929:41a-38: 'dod chags rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod //
T02D1929:41a-39: mnga' bdag 'dod chags las byung ba //
T02D1929:41a-40: dbyangs kun gyi ni mchog gi mchog / rdo rje gsung la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D1929:41a-41: phrag dog rdo rje'i ngo bo khyod //
T02D1929:41a-42: gshin rje gshed de las kun mdzad//
T02D1929:41a-43: sku yi rdo rjer rab snang ba //
T02D1929:41a-44: ral gri'i phyag la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D1929:41a-45: sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin khyod //
T02D1929:41a-46: sangs rgyas rnams ni kun bsdus pa //
T02D1929:41a-47: sangs rgyas kyi ni mchog gi mchog / dkyil 'khor bdag la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1929:41a-48: de nas rdzogs pa'i rim pa bsgom //
T02D1929:41b-1: bsam gtan ma nus bzlas pa ste //
T02D1929:41b-2: bzlas pa bzhi la rab 'bad bya //
T02D1929:41b-3: zla ba drug gis mtshan ma 'byung //
T02D1929:41b-4: de nas sgrub pa chen po brtsam //
T02D1929:41b-5: 'khor lo la sogs gzhung bzhin bya //
T02D1929:41b-6: so so'i dus la gtad bya ste //
T02D1929:41b-8: aom hr'i: shti: wi kri t'i t'a na na h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1929:41b-9: aom yakshe ma med ya tsa ni r'a dza sa do ru na yo ni r'a /
T02D1929:41b-10: aom ya ma r'a dza sa do me ya /
T02D1929:41b-11: ya me do ru na yo da ya /
T02D1929:41b-14: ya kshe ya tstsha ni r'a ma ya /
T02D1929:41b-15: drag po'i gsang sngags man ngag bzhin //
T02D1929:41b-16: so so'i las dang spel bar bya //
T02D1929:41b-17: 'byung po kun gyi gtor ma btang//
T02D1929:41b-18: dang po gshin rje'i dgral dbul //
T02D1929:41b-19: de nas so so'i 'khor la sbyin //
T02D1929:41b-20: sngags chen 'di yis dbul bar bya //
T02D1929:41b-21: aom aindra ya hr'i: ya ma ye sht'i: wa ra n'a ya wi /
T02D1929:41b-27: tsandra ya h'um s'u rya ya h'um /
T02D1929:41b-29: ba su dha r'a ya phat /
T02D1929:41b-30: be ma tsi tra ye sv'a /
T02D1929:41b-35: sgrub pa chen po'i dus su ni //
T02D1929:41b-36: sku gzugs mdun du gzhag par bya //
T02D1929:41b-37: mchog gi sha la sogs pa dbul //
T02D1929:41b-38: mar me che yang rtag tu btang //
T02D1929:41b-39: mchod pa'i mchog rnams dbul bar bya //
T02D1929:41b-40: ma yengs pa yi sems kyis dbul //
T02D1929:41b-41: 'jigs pa'i sems ni ma yin no //
T02D1929:41b-42: sngags pas dpa' bo mchod par bya //
T02D1929:41b-43: spyod lam byed na 'di ltar bsgom //
T02D1929:41b-44: dngos po thams cad gshin rjer bsam //
T02D1929:41b-45: yang na rang rang dag par bya //
T02D1929:41b-46: yang na rdo rje sems dpa' bsgom //
T02D1929:41b-47: las kyi mthar thug 'jam dpal mchog / rtsod pa'i dus su byung ba 'di //
T02D1929:41b-48: bstan pa bsrung ba'i dgos pa dang //
T02D1929:41b-49: las kyi bye brag bsgrub pa dang //
T02D1929:41b-50: blo dman rnams la phan pa'i phyir //
T02D1929:41b-51: rnal 'byor bzhi yi tshul du bris //
T02D1929:41b-52: blo dman dam tshig la gnas pas //
T02D1929:41b-53: rab tu 'bad de bsgrub par bya //
T02D1929:41b-54: rgyud kyi don mchog bsdus pa yi //
T02D1929:41b-55: gshin rje gshed kyi sgrub thabs byas //
T02D1929:41b-56: 'di las ngal ba'i dge ba gang //
T02D1929:41b-57: kun gyis 'jam dpal mchog thob shog / gshin rje
T02D1929:41b-58: gshed nag po'i sgrub pa'i thabs slob dpon nyin mor
T02D1929:41b-59: byed pa'i grags pas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D1929:42a-0: // / zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba @42a * //
